trans-unit.source: How to get started using Azure AD
trans-unit.target: How to get started using Azure AD

trans-unit.source: Covers how to sign up for Azure and first steps you can try with Azure AD.
trans-unit.target: Covers how to sign up for Azure and first steps you can try with Azure AD.

trans-unit.source: How to get started using Azure AD
trans-unit.target: How to get started using Azure AD

trans-unit.target: Other articles on this topic

trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Get started</linkText><title></title></link><html></html>

trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Next steps</linkText><title></title></link><html></html>

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Learn more</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Learn more</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: Ready to get started?
trans-unit.target: Ready to get started?

trans-unit.source: You should try out some of the really cool stuff we've released with Azure Active Directory.
trans-unit.target: You should try out some of the really cool stuff we've released with Azure Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: Use these capabilities to really add value to your organization's identity and access management.
trans-unit.target: Use these capabilities to really add value to your organization's identity and access management.

trans-unit.source: Read documentation to learn how to configure these features.
trans-unit.target: Read documentation to learn how to configure these features.

trans-unit.source: Then see how you can start testing these capabilities by taking the first step and assigning trial licenses to administrators and users.
trans-unit.target: Then see how you can start testing these capabilities by taking the first step and assigning trial licenses to administrators and users.

trans-unit.source: Azure AD is available to everyone for free.
trans-unit.target: Azure AD is available to everyone for free.

trans-unit.source: Sign up now for an Azure trial subscription and your directory will be waiting for you.
trans-unit.target: Sign up now for an Azure trial subscription and your directory will be waiting for you.

trans-unit.source: The directory is yours whether you buy anything or not.
trans-unit.target: The directory is yours whether you buy anything or not.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Try Azure AD now</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Try Azure AD now</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: Secure your organization's access
trans-unit.target: Secure your organization's access

trans-unit.source: Protect your organization's identity data in the cloud using Multi-Factor Authentication to ensure secure local and remote access.
trans-unit.target: Protect your organization's identity data in the cloud using Multi-Factor Authentication to ensure secure local and remote access.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Learn more about multi-factor authentication</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Learn more about multi-factor authentication</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: Change and reset passwords
trans-unit.target: Change and reset passwords

trans-unit.source: Cut costs and decrease helpdesk calls by empowering users to change or reset their Active Directory or Azure Active Directory passwords from any device, at any location.
trans-unit.target: Cut costs and decrease helpdesk calls by empowering users to change or reset their Active Directory or Azure Active Directory passwords from any device, at any location.

trans-unit.source: An administrator can manage password and notification policies, and can see detailed audit activity of these password reset operations the moment they occur.
trans-unit.target: An administrator can manage password and notification policies, and can see detailed audit activity of these password reset operations the moment they occur.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Learn more about managing passwords with Azure Active Directory</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Learn more about managing passwords with Azure Active Directory</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: Create and edit users
trans-unit.target: Create and edit users

trans-unit.source: Create an account for every user who will access a Microsoft cloud service.
trans-unit.target: Create an account for every user who will access a Microsoft cloud service.

trans-unit.source: By default, users do not have administrator permissions, but you can assign them.
trans-unit.target: By default, users do not have administrator permissions, but you can assign them.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Learn more about creating Azure AD users</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Learn more about creating Azure AD users</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: View access and usage reports
trans-unit.target: View access and usage reports

trans-unit.source: Azure AD provides a number of reports for administrators.
trans-unit.target: Azure AD provides a number of reports for administrators.

trans-unit.source: Even more reports are available in the paid editions of Azure AD, and there's a reporting API for creating your own custom reports.
trans-unit.target: Even more reports are available in the paid editions of Azure AD, and there's a reporting API for creating your own custom reports.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Learn more about Azure AD reports</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Learn more about Azure AD reports</linkText><title></title></link>.
